entry.title: Two Heroes and a Baby
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,902Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 453

Summary: In this AU, 19-year-old Bruce Wayne adopts 4-year-old Dick Grayson after he is orphaned by a tragic event at Haly's Circus. Bruce is in over his head trying to juggle establishing himself as a responsible and valuable asset to Wayne Enterprises, beginning his vigilante work in Gotham as The Batman, and parenting a young child despite not knowing where to start. After struggling to get good press and constantly being seen as an irresponsible nepo baby, he sets up an interview at The Daily Planet. That's where he meets 19-year-old intern Clark Kent, who is eager to write a good story to begin his career as a journalist. After Clark agrees to keep an eye on Dick during his interview, Bruce realizes he has a knack for watching children, especially young Dick Grayson. Bruce asks Clark to come live with him at Wayne Manor on a 6 month assignment as Dick's nanny, and in return, will let Clark write the story of a lifetime--an expose on his life that no other reporter has even come close to. Clark reluctantly agrees, but is hiding a secret from Bruce--his life as the superhero, Superman! As the two begin their friendship and double lives as heroes, they learn valuable lessons in friendship, love, and parenting.

entry.title: Cats and Dogs
entry.summary:
Author: riversiders

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 85,345Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 271

Summary: It's not that he doesn't like Clark. He’s obsessed with Clark, actually, and not just because he somehow conned his way into dating him. As suspicious and crazy as it makes Bruce feel, he cannot deny that Clark cares. He’s constantly checking in on Bruce. They talk on the phone practically every day, and Superman has become a frequent and regular visitor at Wayne Manor. Dick adores him. Alfred does too. He keeps making hints about ‘letting Mr. Kent into the club in an official capacity’. Clark is wonderful. He is good—too good. He won't treat Bruce the way Bruce wants to be treated.

entry.title: Dark Days and Lost Suns
entry.summary:
Author: Athena_Faymont

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 175,785Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 168

Summary: Clark admires Batman, the man who has given up civilian life to protect everyone else's, the tough, sharp, and compassionate man. Bruce admires Superman, the alien who, despite being able to dominate them all by force, has decided to take care of a planet that isn't his own.And, even with these two flawed principles, neither of them can imagine how alone the other feels... and how alone they themselves are. This is a long story, the superbat fanfic I've always wanted to write about how, within the canon, one day something changes and they find each other. If you want to join me on this adventure, we'll be here every Friday! [Puedes encontrarlo en español en mi perfil.]

entry.title: When I Am Young and Beautiful
entry.summary:
Author: wordswillwrite

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,119Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 58

Summary: “I can't be both your protector and your executioner.” Clara couldn't speak. The tears spilled over, hot and bitter. Bruce reached out, his gloved hand wiping them away with a gentleness that felt like a knife. He had spent years planning how to stop her, building lead-lined vaults she couldn't see, hiding caches of Kryptonite across the globe—all while she had spent her life trying to love the man behind the cowl. Or) Bruce Wayne, the most dramatic man she knows, dies quietly one afternoon in his Manor. Clara is left to pick up the pieces. To the world, she is Superwoman, an ageless symbol of hope. To Metropolis, she is Clara Kent, an editor hiding behind layers of synth-skin makeup to show the age she will never experience. But at Bruce Wayne’s funeral, the mask is slipping. Left behind in the wake of his ten-year silence is a grieving family, a dying Lex Luthor with a devastating secret, and one final parting gift from a man who was both loving and ruthless.

entry.title: A Kryptonian and His Gladiator
entry.summary:
Author: Eyeslikedawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,950Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 110

Summary: Kryptonian society on the conquered planet Earth is complicated to say the least. When Lord Kal-El's house-guard is slain he decides to rebuild his ranks by purchasing a prized gladiator from Gotham City. His name is Bruce Wayne but the fans of the arena know him as Batman. Regardless of what they call him, though, with the human's stoic demeanor, and grim attitude, Kal has certainly bought more than he bargained for.

entry.title: one look at you (and I can't disguise)
entry.summary:
Author: burningredbutitsgolden

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,488Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 67

Summary: As he entered his bedroom window and changed out of his primary-colored suit, Clark's thoughts wandered to what Batman's eyes looked like beneath those lenses. Were they warm and brown, softening the angular shape of his face? It seemed unlikely. He didn't think his eyes would be cold, necessarily, but maybe more of a striking color. Blue, like ice? Perhaps green, a rarer shade to fit his mystery? For all Clark knew, they could be something else entirely. OR: Superman and Batman are obsessed with each other. It manifests in extreme fixations on the other's eyes.
